meanings.definition: The action of subscribing to a service or publication.
meanings.sent1: My monthly subscription to the magazine allows me to read all the latest articles.
meanings.sent2: She signed up for a subscription to the streaming service to watch her favorite shows.
meanings.sent3: His subscription to the newspaper was so popular that the delivery person had to wear sunglasses to protect their eyes from all the shiny pages.
meanings.sent4: The subscription to the online course was like having a personal tutor available 24/7.
meanings.sent5: The subscription to the gym membership motivated her to work out regularly and stay healthy.

meanings.definition: An arrangement to receive something regularly by paying in advance.
meanings.sent1: The annual subscription to the fruit delivery service ensured fresh produce at her doorstep every week.
meanings.sent2: He purchased a subscription to the meal kit service to simplify his weekly grocery shopping.
meanings.sent3: The subscription to the ice cream club was a sweet surprise every month.
meanings.sent4: Her subscription to the flower delivery service brought a burst of color into her home each month.
meanings.sent5: The subscription to the book club expanded his reading list and introduced him to new authors regularly.
